title: Early-2010s YouTube-style pink restyle with animated creme heading and mom photo banner

requirements.summary: Restyle the single-page homepage layout to evoke an early-2010s YouTube UI while keeping the joke interaction prominent and functional.
acceptanceCriteria: The top-of-page header/navigation area visually resembles early-2010s YouTube (e.g., boxed/strip header, compact controls, and overall nostalgic spacing/typography), without changing the app into a multi-page site.
The existing joke interaction (show punchline / next joke) remains functional and prominent on the page.

file_operations.description: Update the top header area to a more early-2010s video-site layout (boxed strip, compact control cluster such as faux search/action items) while staying single-page; keep and visually prioritize the existing joke Card and the show/next interaction. Continue using shadcn-ui components already present (e.g., Button/Card/Badge) for consistent surfaces and controls; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Adjust global typography and spacing defaults to better match an early-2010s video-site feel (more utilitarian font stack and slightly tighter/boxier UI rhythm) without introducing blue/purple-dominant styling.

requirements.summary: Add and render a wide, cropped stock-photo-style banner image of an excited mom giving a thumbs up at the top of the page.
acceptanceCriteria: A new static image asset exists under frontend/public/assets/generated and is used as a full-width top banner.
The banner is visually cropped to a wide aspect ratio (banner-style) and sits at the top of the page above the main content.
The page loads without broken image links.

file_operations.description: Add the required generated static banner asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/excited-mom-thumbs-up-banner.dim_1600x400.png.

Wire the new banner image frontend/public/assets/generated/excited-mom-thumbs-up-banner.dim_1600x400.png into the top of the page as a full-width, visually cropped banner above the main content (and above/around the header as required), ensuring no broken links and maintaining the single-page layout.

requirements.summary: Make the main on-page heading creme-colored with a slow, looping gloss/sheen animation without affecting layout or interactions.
acceptanceCriteria: The prominent on-page heading text remains exactly "your_mom's_website" and is rendered in a creme color.
A visible gloss/sheen effect animates across the heading continuously (indefinite loop) at a slow speed.
The animation does not block interaction and does not cause layout shift.

file_operations.description: Add a reusable heading gloss/sheen animation (keyframes + utility/class) designed to loop slowly and not cause layout shift; ensure the base heading color is creme and remains readable on the pink palette.

Apply the new creme + sheen styling to the prominent heading text that renders exactly "your_mom's_website" (ensure only styling changes, no text changes), and confirm the animation does not interfere with the joke interaction. If using any shadcn-ui typography patterns around headings, verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Switch the global theme to vibrant pink background, darker pink surfaces, and white default text, with explicit non-white footer manufacturing/copyright text.
acceptanceCriteria: Global background reads as a lighter, vibrant pink; primary UI surfaces (cards/containers/header surfaces) read as a darker pink.
Default text across the page renders as white on the pink UI.
The footer area includes "moms_of_ momland.inc" and joke copyright notes, and those specific texts are not white (but remain readable and consistent with the design).

file_operations.description: Replace the current warm orange/coral CSS variable theme with a vibrant pink palette: lighter vibrant pink for --background, darker pink for key surfaces (e.g., --card/--popover/--secondary), and set default text variables (e.g., --foreground, --card-foreground) to white; ensure no blue/purple-dominant colors are introduced.

Ensure key UI surfaces (header strip, cards/containers) read as darker pink and default text reads as white under the updated theme; add footer content including the exact text "moms_of_ momland.inc" and joke copyright notes, styling those specific footer texts to be non-white yet readable and consistent with the design. Continue using shadcn-ui components already present (Card/Badge/Button) for surfaces where applicable; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
